game.title: Pascal's Wager
game.description: Pascal's Wager is a dark fantasy action RPG inspired by souls-like games. In a world covered by darkness, players take on the role of couriers who deliver light. Fight challenging monsters, explore mysterious lands, and uncover the secrets of this desolate world.

specifications.languages: English, 简体中文, 繁體中文, 日本語, 한국어, Español, Português, Français, Deutsch, Русский

achievements.name: Trophies Coming Soon
achievements.description: Trophies for this game will be added in the future
